name: plugin
description: Manage Isaac plugins: install, remove, enable, disable, and develop plugins

subcommands.name: install
subcommands.description: Install a plugin from the registry

subcommands.name: search
subcommands.description: Search for plugins in the registry

subcommands.name: info
subcommands.description: Show detailed information about a plugin

subcommands.name: update
subcommands.description: Update a plugin or all plugins

subcommands.name: create
subcommands.description: Create a new plugin from template

examples: plugin search git            # Search for git-related plugins
plugin install command-logger # Install a plugin
plugin enable git-status    # Enable a plugin
plugin create my-plugin     # Create a new plugin
